Closed_Question.Name: health_impact
Closed_Question.Stem: Did the resources provided by UCLA CTSI result in scientific and/or health impact?

Open_Question.Name: health_impact_statement
Open_Question.Stem: Please provide a brief statement as to how the UCLA CTSI resources received a scientific, health, and/or community impact.

Question_Block.Name: improvement
Question_Block.Stem: Please rate the extent to which resources that you received from the UCLA CTSI have improved.
Question_Block.Sub_Stem: Improved health care for a group of patients/for a population.
Improved health-related behaviors for a group of patients/for a population.
Improved health for a group of patients/for a population.
Improved the quality of science/inquiry in your field.

Open_Question.Name: barriers_moving_research
Open_Question.Stem: Please describe barriers or challenges you encountered in moving your research forward after receiving UCLA CTSI support.

Open_Question.Name: facilitating_factors
Open_Question.Stem: Please describe facilitating factors that enabled advances in your research after receiving UCLA CTSI support.

Invitee_Fields.p: Thank you for your interest in the UCLA CTSI Census. Because you are starting this survey from a shared link, we need to ask for some basic information about you. Please fill out the information requested below. Your email address is not required but providing it will enable you to resume if you get interrupted. Your email is also required for you to be entered into the drawing for an iPad.

salutation.label: Select the saluation to use in email messages to you:
